Headline: #67 67th-69th-71st Temporary Reroute near King Drive/69th
ShortDescription: 67th-69th-71st rr WB via Marquette, Rhodes, So Chgo, Marquette, Laffayette & 69th: EB via 69th, State, Marquette, So Chgo & Rhodes due to blckge nr King Dr/69th

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#67 67th-69th-71st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near King Drive/69th.

  • Westbound buses will operate via Marquette, Rhodes, South Chicago, Marquette, Laffayette and 69th
  • Eastbound buses will operate via 69th, State, Marquette, South Chicago and Rhodes.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #30 South Chicago Temporary Reroute near King Drive/69th

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#30 South Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near King Drive/69th.

Northbound buses will operate via South Chicago, Marquiette, Laffayette and 69th.

Southbound buses will operate via 69th, State, Marquette and South Chicago.

Allow extra travel time.
